reviews.review: 新人杀手推荐电锯。简单好玩，还没试过当生存者

玩了两天，特地过来修改下评论，之前因为第二把卡了，后来玩了两天没有卡过一次，服务器比GTAV好多了，GTAV开加速器都要连好久，这个裸连无压力，游戏确实非常好玩，非常刺激，而且我玩电锯屠夫已经4杀过一次了，好开心，玩人类修发电机有点难，老是爆，需要多加练习，在说下缺点，进游戏有时候会出现视角不好转动的BUG，人类要修下发电机或者过会才好，希望制作组修复下，还有希望加大退游戏的惩罚，有时遇到被挂树上，或者抓不到人退游戏的，总的来说是款好游戏，大家放心购买吧，至少我玩了两天没遇到过挂壁。
我觉得挺好玩啊，当人类打不过就当屠夫，开局在大门等他们，等修完电机一起刷分给人类人物加技能，萌新感觉被坑也没什么，毕竟买的晚，不然怎么才能刺激起来呢┐(´-｀)┌
อยากให้แก้ไขเรื่องการหาห้อง
บัคเยอะ

Are the queue times long? Yes they are.
Is the gameplay repetitive in it's nature? Yes it is.
Is DbD a bad game? Not at all.

This game, although somewhat repetitive, still pushes me to play it. The gameplay is nice with a multitude of killers and different survivors with their own unique abilities.

The only problem? Everything is long. From the queue times that I mentionned earlier to the character ranks and levels that take forever to get. Even worse, the only way to unlock stuff for your characters is to level them up.
This is probably why I see a lot of high leveled/high ranked players play like scaredy cats and never going in for risky saves and whatnot, they don't want to lose their progress.

Although this game WILL make you wait, I think that it is still worth it's price but that you shouldn't sit for massive marathons as it will get boring.

As someone who has owned this game since the beginning, I am seriously disappointed coming back to find where this company has gone with this game. The killers have it SO easy now, once they have more than one perk, every game is literally spoon-fed to them. Only people who are new to this game seem to struggle with killing ALL survivors every round.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]DISABLING HOOKS/WIGGLING[/h1] Bring back disabling hooks indefinitely or adjust how close hooks are in each game without an offering. There is almost no chance of wiggling out, especially because now survivors can't wiggle while the killer is recovering? Maybe this was park of a perk but it was very frustrating. 

[hr][/hr]
[h1]PUNISH CAMPING[/h1] The fact that you stand by this exploit as a 'valid tactic' is just straight up a mistake. It ruins the game for 4/5 people playing, and is not fun to play against. Make it so that as long as the killer is within the radius of a hooked survivor for (x) time, generators begin to repair (y)% faster, and have it increase incrementally. 
There are many ways to solve camping, none of which seem to peak any interest from you. It makes me not want to continue to play this game.

Survivors camp too! It's ridiculous having useless teammates ending the game with more bloodpoints when they just sit and wait at the hatch once it spawns while their team does the rest of the work.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]NERF THESE PERKS; [/h1]
[b]++Corrupt Intervention -[/b] Why on this planet did you think 120 seconds was a good idea? For TWO MINUTES, three generators are completely irrelevant and they're all in the same area because they're the furthest ones from the killer. If it was random that would make more sense, or if you nerfed the time.
[b]++Iron Grasp -[/b] What is the point of even having wiggling when you can't wiggle out in between hooks on most maps. Now you also have a perk that can reduce wiggling effects up to 75%?! HELLO?
[b]++Hex -[/b] Undying: ADD A COOLDOWN

[hr][/hr]
 [h1]NERF THESE KILLERS; [/h1]
[b]++Doctor -[/b] You can just spam electrocute people until you catch them screaming as they try to climb through a window or knock down a pallet. It's not even tough to catch people.
[b]++Leatherface -[/b] Quite literally why did you make this character instead of making it a skin for the Hillbilly? It's a character completely designed for camping. Hook one survivor and the game is over because you can just instantly kill anyone that comes to save them. It's actually ridiculous.
[b]++Deathslinger -[/b] Fix how getting harpooned interacts through windows/walls.
[b]++The Clown -[/b] Can throw two potions and hit someone within 2 seconds.
[b]++The Twins -[/b] Victor is way too fast.
[b]++The Hag -[/b] She can currently place ALL of her traps in a circle around a hooked survivor. It should have a limit of proximity from other traps or a longer cooldown effect.
[b]++The Legion-[/b] Has basically no negative effects for missing hits. Which wouldn't be an issue if she didn't run 1000 feet per second. It's ridiculous.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]GAME MODES[/h1]
There is so much potential for new game modes. Can you imagine a prop hunt styled game mode in DbD? It would be outrageously funny. The custom games that would come from it. Among Us styled where the killer looks like a survivor and has limited abilities? Killer v Killer? Definitely need more here.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]THE HATCH[/h1]
The ability for the killer to close the hatch with one survivor left is ridiculous considering how long it takes to open the door. For one survivor, the killer can close the hatch, and check BOTH doors before the survivor can get to a door/look for the hatch and open a door. It should be time enough for a 50/50. If the killer chooses the right door, the survivor is found, if not, they escape.

This is especially true when it comes to killers than can one hit the survivor (Ghost Face, Mike Meyers, etc). 0 Chance to escape with killers like that, especially since they can openly search for the hatch faster.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]MATCHMAKING[/h1]
So you're playing a game as normal. Suddenly, your game crashes, and you have to restart it. You load back into the game to find YOU'RE TEMPORARILY BANNED. Which wouldn't be an issue to stop people from just quitting if your game was stable. So why not make it so that you can RECONNECT TO THE GAME if you're a survivor??? I don't understand who thought the instant ban was the way to go without scanning crash logs or something first.

[hr][/hr]
TDLR; The game is not balanced. The killers have it EASY. How do I know? I have around 500 hours played. 

I'll add/edit more as this goes.
很棒.但是新手非常蛋疼

I have many hours played time in this game, and it can actually be pretty fun when playing with friends. I have played this game since Beta and I will admit it has come a long way since then.

Dead By Daylight is definitely that repetitive game that I love and hate, I leave it for 5 months and it gives me vice for 5 months, I have been like this since 2016 I will probably continue like this forever, I love this game, I hate this game. In summary, I recommend it, but it is a game that has been running for a couple of years and still has a lot to correct.

Als erstes. Ich spiele Dead By Daylight seit fast 700 Stunden. Also weiß ich wovon ich rede. Das Spiel ist gut! Und das Spiel entwickelt sich ständig. Sei mal dahingestellt in welche Richtung. Ob nun gut oder schlecht... Naja. Aber es entwickelt sich. Leider sieht man das nicht oft bei Spielen. Die Devs sind ständig dabei und machen neue Sachen. Sie probieren sich aus und versuchen es auszubalancieren. Dafür dicke Probs.

Der negativste Askept ist die Community. Einer beschuldigt den anderen. Egal was man macht, es ist falsch. Zur Zeit entwickelt sich so ein kleiner Teufelskreis. Ob die Survivor oder die Killer angefangen haben spielt dabei auch keinerlei Rolle. Aber einer sabotiert nur noch Haken und macht das ganze Spiel lang nichts anderes. Der nächste denkt er sei der Oberprofi und regelt das Spiel alleine. Auf der Killerseite sind fast nur noch Camper (stehen durchgehend beim Haken oder sogar direkt davor) oder Tunnler (Die nur noch den nehmen, der am Haken hing und alle anderen komplett ignoriert). Für beides gibt es natürlich die Oberexperten die meinen, jaaa dann musst du das und das machen. Oder dies und das. Mag ja sein, dass es hilft, aber der Reiz des Spieles ist, dass man mit fremden Leuten zusammengeworfen wird und es möglichst als Team raussschaft. In all den Spielen die ich bis jetzt spielen durfte, kam dies leider viel zu wenig vor. Denn jeder denkt an sich. Und die Killer werden immer mehr gebufft. Ich möchte das auf keinen Fall schlecht reden. Finde ich sogar gut, denn es gab Zeiten, in denen der Killer ein absoluter Witz war, dennoch sind einige Sachen sehr unausgereift.

Aber wie anfänglich erwähnt. Sie arbeiten dran ein Balancing zu finden und das möchte ich Ihnen gut schreiben. Die Entwickler können nichts für die Community.

Sehr gutes Spiel. Viele lustige Bugs, die das Spiel, wenn man sie findet, sehr sehr lustig gestalten und eine abgefuckte Community.

Il gioco in sé è valido, compresa l'idea abbastanza innovativa di gameplay che non ha rivali. Purtroppo è rinomato per i frequenti bug o errori di vario tipo. Consiglio agli sviluppatori di dedicare più tempo alla risoluzione di bug e glitch, diminuendo quello dedicato al rilascio di nuovi personaggi e skin. Potrebbe capitare di aspettare un po' troppo tempo in lobby per via del matchmaking poco ottimizzato. Consiglio di giocare con amici per annoiarsi meno durante l'attesa.

Addictive and fun to play game in theory...

Reality:

1. Bugs ... a ton of them.... everytime the developers "fix" something they break two new things... every week they promis enews and changes and nothing really happens at all.

2. Connection - peer to peer .... if you are lucky enough to find a game ( which can take up to an hour if you queue with 3 other friends) you have high chances of getting dodged by the host (the killer) because he doesnt want to play against a group of friends ... OR you get the laggiest game experience that you ever saw... 

3. More bugs and exploits people could use without getting punished or anythign being done against it.

4. Wrong priorities by teh developers: They rate pumping out new PAID DLCS higher than actually takign a step back and fixing stuff the community really tells them to fix for month over and over again.

5. Saltiest Community next to league of legends where no matter how your playstyle as a kilelr is, you will always get shit on by survivors that got killed by you and vicy versa killers will always flame about "unfair" survivors... really really not enjoyable.

Yes i have over 1200+ hours in this game mainly because i streamed it and had a nice community in my stream, but since the latest "engine update" where they wanted to make the game look better and increase the performance they actually made the game even more laggy for a lot of players (and yes my pc specs are more than enough to properly stream and play this game in theory) ... but i guess proper programming isnt their strength. Cant play this game anymore since the update ! nice!

Honestly, I love this game, but I hate it more than I love it. Here are a few points why this is NOT worth buying.

- Toxic Community: Fail to unhook someone, camp someone to win, do anything that's not in the meta and you're bad. After game chats are as toxic as Chrenobyl, with no one actually taking blame or taking responsibility for what they did.

- Unessecary Competitive "Resets" and Bad Lower Ranks: Every 13th of each month, you're rank is reset to almost the lowest rank, with mine, 7 (the 7th highest) going to 19, (the second lowest). Rank resets are not only unnecessary, as there is no "placement matches" or highly competitive tiering system (where only X amount of people can hold a rank) to warrant a reset, as well as the fact that good players have to play with sub-par or below average teamates in a RANKED TEAM-BASED game. It just ruins the game to have to play with lower skill ranks that do not understand the game.

- Lack of an Unranked Gamemode: Sure, you can play with a party of just friends, but lacking friends to play with causes you to have to play ranked, because there is only ranked. Unranked public online games in Dead by Daylight simply do not exsist. 

- Balance Issues in play: Some killers such as: the Nurse and the Doctor both counter key aspects to a Survivor's gameplay. The Nurse has an overpowered blinking ability that allows her to teleport closer to any survivor she's chasing. This also allows her to teleport straight through objects, walls and pallets, the latter being the keystone to a survivor's survival due to the lack of other options presented by the devs. Which brings up my next point, the Doctor. The Doctor has an electrical field that can go through walls and objects and is on at all times that forces the survivor to scream and give away his position while within his terror raidus. These 2 killers take away the Survivor's ability to avoid killers, one being the Nurse and the chase, and the other being the Doctor and hiding.

- In Conclusion: This game is only fun in the high ranks, low ranks suck because most of the people playing are incompetent, trolling, are new or haven't played in a long time. I would not reccomend this game.

J'aime ce jeu. J'aime vraiment ce jeu mais il est extrêmement mal foutu.

Si vous aimez jouer seul, foncez. 

dans le cas contraire si vous désirez jouer en groupe avec des amis, Fuyez.

Le jeu souffre d'un énorme problème au niveau du matchmaking.
Je n'ai aucun problème à jouer seul mais une partie de temps en temps avec des potes ne fait pas de mal.
Le jeu compte en moyenne 15 000 joueurs par jour comment expliquez vous qu'en étant en groupe à deux cela prennent plus de 3/4 d'heures ? et j'exagère à peine je vous explique même pas la durée d'attente à trois ou quatre..
Et ce n'est pas un soucis d'équilibrage peut importe notre rank le temps d'attente reste le même.

Et en attendant vous êtes là devant votre écran, à ne plus compter les heures perdues,
Moi qui aimait tant ce jeu, actuellement en train d'attendre une partie avec mon ami Kaneki,
Je rédige cette évaluation,
Dans l'espoir de voir un jour cet affreux problème résolu,
Je décide d'arrêter ce jeu qui me tenait tant à coeur..
En espérant un jour pouvoir revenir dans de meilleurs conditions.
Adieu.

good game

Dead by Daylight ist eines der besten Spiele die ich kenne, nur so um das mal zu sagen :).
 
Ich spiele es schon eine ganze Weile und bin JETZT zufrieden mit dem Spiel, da es immer weiter verbessert wird so, dass das Spielerlebnis intensiv und spannend wird, sowie die Spieler Spaß haben können.

Natürlich gibt es immernoch viele Bugs und es gibt SO VIELE Spieler die einfach nur für sich selbst spielen! 
Die DbD Spieler sollten auch mal selbst checken, dass das Spiel viel spannender wird wenn keiner wie ein Arschloch spielt, auf beiden Seiten! (also facecamping, tunneling, sandbagging, teabagging, PALLET LOOPING).  Guys, ja ich weiß, dass das einfach zum Spiel gehört und ja klar macht es, aber es gibt Leute die das einfach die ganze Zeit machen um es jemand anderem unnötig schwer zu machen. und das ist unnötig. und langweilig af.

Sonst sehe ich eigentlich keine Fehler im Spiel (abgesehen von den, ich sag mal jetzt "minimalen" Bugs) und durch die Softbans gibt es auch viel weniger dodger und rage quits. 
 
Im großen und ganzen ein sehr nices und spannendes Spiel :D

Игра которая с годами маленькими шагами развивается, любишь ты её или ненавидишь, но прогресс виден. За достаточно маленький промежуток в три года игра подвергалась значительным изменениям, от визуальной части до баланса.
[h1] Плюсы [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Каждый сезон выходит новый киллер, выживший, карта, навыки.
    [*]В значимые праздники выходят ивенты. 
    [*]Уникальный в своем жанре
[/list]
[h1] Минусы [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Огромное количество проблем с запуском игры, особенно во время больших обновлений.
[/list]
Опять же могло быть минусов больше, но разработчики сделали довольно много исправлений.
В целом я остался от игры довольным, за 1 500 часов она оставила много позитивных так и отрицательных эмоций, я приобрел много знакомых которым я благодарен что они терпят меня)) и поддерживают.

Хэй, поиграв несколько часов, понимаешь на сколько данная игра крутая.Всё время проведённое в игре за жертв, ты вживаешься в их роль и действительно переживаешь за персонажа и боишься встретиться лицом к лицу с маньяком.Игра за маньяка ты становишься беспощадным убийцей и понимаешь что ты хозяин на данной территории.Вообщем игра заслуживает вашего внимания.

前提是你需要有陪你玩耍的小伙伴。

bgfhfbgfd

B站看了直播来的我，不知不觉也玩了好长时间了，游戏的代入感一直是这个游戏很多人不敢涉足的原因之一，当然只是在夸它，阴森的BGM、突如其来的音效和黑暗的环境相互配合，真的是让人有身临其境的感觉，这也就让杀鸡这个游戏的恐怖发挥到了极致！就算玩了这么长的时间我都会被身边因为受惊而突然鸣叫的乌鸦吓到= =
       不过可能是屠夫玩家人数少的原因，经常匹配不到人  “准备半小时，游戏5分钟（手动再见）“那些玩了几百个小时的大佬是不是花了一半多的时间都在准备等待= =
       还有莫名其妙的反作弊系统（？）导致的经常闪退、进游戏的载入经常半个多小时都读取不了，要重新启动游戏。努力挑战玩家耐性........可以的，很强势。一更新就出问题也不知道是不是我的错觉，身边的玩家也这么觉得。游戏本身是没什么问题的，有待改进吧= =

WOW!I buyed this game and i can not play it because my laptop is low end and when i try to install it on my screen appear this message ,,this game is not available on this platform".I can play it just on my PC and i know that if u go in the %appdata% u can change the setting there and make it playable!Don't recommand if u have a low end PC/laptop!

Стою 2-ой час напротив , почти вплотную, с маньяком, и , знаете в чём мать его фишка? У ОБОИХ БЛЯТЬ ПЕРСОНАЖИ ЗАСТРЯЛИ (логично из-за ебливого бага). Думал что он давал пофармить оказывается бедняжка застряла , И БЛЯТЬ СУКА ЕБЛАН УЁБОК МРАЗЬ ХУЙЛО тоже. 
P.S маньяк > выжившего

I almost have 1000 hours in this game and I have to say I'm thoroughly enjoying myself more than I expected I would. This game has one of the steepest learning curves in any non-AAA game I've played, but the payoff is so worth it. Even though this game does have a lot of problems and bugs, the small developer team they have really makes an effort to listen to the community with their weekly developer streams. I highly recommend this game.
This Game Is GoodGame
